DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate Effect Sitagliptin , dipeptidyl peptidase-4 inhibitor , Progression Coronary Intermediate Lesion .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Sitagliptin Progression Coronary Intermediate Lesion
DOC.criteria: Patients > 18 , < 80 year old , type 2 diabetes mellitus angiographically proven Coronary Intermediate Lesion . Allergy hypersensitivity drug 's component . Severe liver failure , moderate severe kidney failure Malignant disease . Active infectious disease . Pregnancy breastfeeding .
